Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In user mode, create one participation to context "AdminContext" called "UserContext"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "UserContext" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Remove both "AdminContext" and "UserContext" without deleting them

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context viewer is empty in both administrator and user mode

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Right click in the context viewer and select "Import context…" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Import contexts" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator directory and click on the "OK" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The file selector disappears. The Contexts tree has been updated.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the "AdminContext" in the Contexts tree through it checkbox

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" context has been added to the administrator context view

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "UserContext" context has been added to the user context view

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Automatic context discovery with "-maxDepth" and "-excludeDirectories" command line parameters

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Within the previous directory, create the following directory trees: - D1 - D1\D11 - D1\E12 - D1\E12\E121 - D2 - D2\D21 - D2\D21\D211 - D2\E22
Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and add the following parameters at the top: -userOnly -adminContextsPoolLocation D:\OrchestraFrameworkTest\Administrator
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0, A1, A12, A21, A22, B0, B11, B121, B2, B211

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and set the following parameter at the top: -maxDepth 1
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0,B0

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and set the following parameter at the top: -maxDepth 3
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0, A1, A12, A21, A22, B0, B11, B2

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and remove the use of the -maxDepth parameter
Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and set the following parameter at the top: -excludeDirectories **\E*
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0, A1, A21, B0, B11, B2, B211

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and set the following parameter at the top: -excludeDirectories D1
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0, A21, A22, B0, B2, B211

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Edit framework.ini of the Orchestra Framework and set the following parameter at the top: -excludeDirectories *\*2*
Right click on the Orchestra icon in the system tray and click on the "Join context" entry

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following list of contexts is available: A0, A1, B0, B11, B2
